text: The Angas, Angas-Sura, or Central West Chadic, (A.3 West Chadic) languages are a branch of West Chadic languages. They are spoken in North Nigeria.Takács, Gábor. 2004. Comparative Dictionary of the Angas-Sura Languages. Berlin: Reimer. ==Languages== The Angas languages are:Blench, Roger. 2017. Current research on the A3 West Chadic languages. ;Angas *Ngasic: Ngas (Angas), Belnəng *Mwaghavulic: Mwaghavul, Mupun (Mapun), Takas (Toos); Cakfem-Mushere *Miship (Chip) *Pan cluster **Chakato; Jorto (spurious) **Jipal, Mernyang (Mirriam), Kwagallak, Kofyar (Doemak), Bwol, Goram, Jibyal *Nteng *Tel (Tɛɛl, Montol) *Talic: Tal, Pyapun, Koenoem *Goemaic: Goemai *Yiwom (Ywom, Gerka) ==References== Category:West Chadic languages Category:Languages of Nigeria
title: Angas languages
